title: Render bev.mp4 when calibration gate passes
scope: When BEV gating passes, project player/ball tracks into pitch meters and render a BEV video.
Keep rendering deterministic and include missing-state semantics.
Persist BEV render diagnostics for audits.
acceptance: bev.mp4 is produced when gated-on and absent/explicitly missing when gated-off.
BEV render includes players and ball when available, and indicates missing/unknown states.
Diagnostics include BEV render parameters and gating decision.

deliverables.title: BEV renderer module and CLI wiring
acceptance: Renderer produces a playable bev.mp4 under the bundle layout.
BEV rendering is enabled only when gating passes.

subtasks.title: Implement BEV renderer and integrate gating.
done_when: bev/render.py exists and writes bev.mp4 deterministically.
CLI runner writes bev.mp4 only when gated-on.
